p: Based on in silico analysis, the drug likeness score of CBDA predicted it as possible G protein-coupled receptors (GPCRs) ligands, ion channel modulators, kinase inhibitors, nuclear receptor ligands, and protease inhibitors with moderately active in all bioactive scores [ 101]. According to recent studies CBDA has anticancer activity [ 63, 64, 65, 66], anti-inflammatory activity [ 67, 68, 69], antiemetic effect [ 70, 71], and anticonvulsant effect [ 72]. Due to its pharmacological property ( Table 2), it is getting more and more attention.
